meanings.definition: Meat or other food that is cooked by baking.
meanings.sent1: I baked some bakemeats for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The bakemeats in the oven smelled delicious.
meanings.sent3: The bakemeats were so tasty, they disappeared in seconds!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the bakemeats filled the entire house.
meanings.sent5: Grandma's secret to juicy bakemeats is a special marinade.

meanings.definition: A dish made by baking meat or other food.
meanings.sent1: The bakemeats on the table looked appetizing.
meanings.sent2: She prepared a variety of bakemeats for the potluck.
meanings.sent3: The bakemeats were the star of the dinner party.
meanings.sent4: The golden crust on the bakemeats was perfection.
meanings.sent5: The bakemeats were a hit at the family gathering.
